---
title: "STV @ New Plymouth District Council"
---

There were five STV elections for New Plymouth District Council in 2019.

## Mayor

One seat elected from six candidates in one iteration.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374375234" width="640" height="361" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## New Plymouth Ward

10 seats elected from 30 candidates in 69 iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374374846" width="640" height="974" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## North Ward

Two seats elected from four candidates in one iteration.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374375527" width="640" height="308" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## South-West Ward

Two seats elected from four candidates in three iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374782819" width="640" height="306" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>


## Waitara Community Board

Four seats elected from six candidates in five iterations.

<iframe src="https://player.vimeo.com/video/374782862" width="640" height="358" frameborder="0" allow="autoplay; fullscreen" allowfullscreen></iframe>
